metadata.title: USN-6849-1 -- Salt vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that Salt incorrectly validated method calls and sanitized paths. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to access some methods without authentication. (CVE-2020-11651, CVE-2020-11652)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6849-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  salt-common - 0.17.5+ds-1ubuntu0.1~esm2 salt-doc - 0.17.5+ds-1ubuntu0.1~esm2 salt-master - 0.17.5+ds-1ubuntu0.1~esm2 salt-minion - 0.17.5+ds-1ubuntu0.1~esm2 salt-ssh - 0.17.5+ds-1ubuntu0.1~esm2 salt-syndic - 0.17.5+ds-1ubuntu0.1~esm2 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
